sentences.sContent: Students with a background in chemistry will probably find the course easier.
sentences.sCn: 学过化学的学生可能会觉得这门课程容易些。

sentences.sContent: It’s important to understand other people, people from different backgrounds .
sentences.sCn: 要理解别人，理解那些来自不同背景的人，这是很重要的。

sentences.sContent: Do you know anything about his background?
sentences.sCn: 关于他的背景，你知道什么吗？

sentences.sContent: ...parents’ attitudes toward education do not seem to reflect their own educational background as much as a belief in the importance of education for upward mobility...
...sex and background Some groups of people are more vulnerable to the illness...
...along with the family background and pre-selected ability of the students themselves that determine their outcomes...
...this is playing out against the background of global warming and human interference with natural ecosystems...

phrases.pCn: 学历；教育背景；教育程度
学术背景；学历；教育背景
白色背景；比色板；比色纸

工作经历；企业背景；事情履历

words.tran: 政府官员举行的记者招待会；提供背景资料的简报或报告

trans.tranCn: 出身背景， 经历； 背景资料； 背景， 底子
trans.tranOther: someone’s family, education, previous work etc
